resources.string: DO TRY TESTING YOUR QR CODE USING SEVERAL READERS, INCLUDING SMARTPHONE CAMERA \nDO USE A HIGH CONTRAST COLOR COMBINATION BETWEEN THE CODE ITSELF AND THE BACKGROUND

DONâ€™T USE COLORS THAT ARE DIFFICULT TO SCAN. \n - For instance, a bright yellow on a sunny surface may disappear from the QR code scanner.\n- You should also avoid monochromatic designs or using a complicated background design when placing a QR code, both of which make it more difficult to scan.
